alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 12:12AM EDT until July 25 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Erie County in northwestern Pennsylvania... Northern Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 100 AM EDT. * At 1212 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cambridge Springs, or 10 miles north of Meadville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Corry, Edinboro, Union City, Cambridge Springs, Riceville, Lincolnville, Canadohta Lake, Saegertown, Hydetown, Mill Village, Blooming Valley, Townville, Spartansburg, Venango, Elgin and Woodcock. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
